ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mul.1 | |- A e. CC |

| 3 |  | mul.3 | |- C e. CC |
| 4 |  | #P_addcan2 | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A + C ) = ( B + C ) <-> A = B ) ) |
